collaborators.title: Pilot Team
collaborators.message: Find here the list of teachers, administrative staff and students authorized to modify the establishment's data

footprints.title: My Footprints
footprints.message: Create your first footprint here. You can then view your footprints or create new ones at any time.

sites.title: My Establishments
sites.message: Find here the list of establishments linked to your account

home.title: Calculating your simplified carbon footprint will allow you to:

alert.info: The Clickson calculator allows you to estimate the climate impact of your activity. It is above all an awareness tool. It is not a low-carbon transition approach but a simplified carbon footprint — in the sense of the <link>Guide to communication around carbon accounting</link> — focused on the main emission sources related to the activity of establishments.

info.0: Understand the measurement of your establishment's impact
info.2: In the long term, and through more in-depth work, build a reduction trajectory

study.firstSimplifiedStudyMessage: It's time to get started! We invite you to create your first simplified carbon footprint.
study.selectSite: Before filling in data, please select an establishment
study.validatedOnlyDescription: As a student, I have access as a contributor to one or more emission posts.

suggestion.name: Example: carbon footprint Simone Veil Middle School

glossary.validatorEmailDescription: As a student, I have access as a contributor to one or more emission posts.
glossary.duplicationOptionsDescription: When duplicating a study, you can choose to invite the same team members and students from the original study to the new one. This helps maintain collaboration continuity.

new.etp: Number of staff (teachers and non-teaching staff)

deleting.confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove {email} from this study's students?

role.description: Here you can manage the students to your study. They will have access to certain posts and sub-posts (which you can define) and will be able to fill in certain information for emission sources that you have already created in the study. For more information on the contributor interface, please see our <link>FAQ</link>.

pdf.title: Emissions Summary {year}

charts.siteEmissions: Emissions in tCO2e of the school establishment {site} in {year}

questions.goals-subtitle: Present the objectives of your action (awareness, emissions reduction...). Is this a short-term or strategic action?
questions.shareholders-subtitle: Have you designated a team to lead the action on a daily and long-term basis? Indicate their names and role/function
questions.otherStakeholders-subtitle: Remember to distinguish internal and external stakeholders here. They will not lead the action daily but will help you by providing electricity bills, for example. This could be your establishment's manager or your local authority.
questions.ressourcesToBeImplemented-subtitle: What are the steps and means to be used? This can be human, material, financial resources... Build this part well, it is essential!
questions.monitoringIndicators-subtitle: Write down indicators here that you can use in 6 months / 1 year to assess the success of your action. An example: % reduction in GHG
questions.estimatedCarbonImpacts-subtitle: To what extent does your action reduce GHG emissions?
questions.otherEstimatedEnvironmentalImpacts-subti: Think here about the positive or negative impacts of your action on biodiversity, water, waste...
questions.estimatedSocialImpacts-subtitle: We try here to know if the action helps reduce eco-anxiety, promote learning, reduce school dropout, promote youth integration...
questions.calendar-subtitle: Write down the main stages of your action here, choose your time scale well!

pdf.additionalInfo: The results you obtain here are a simplified calculation of your establishment's carbon footprint and do not meet the requirements of the Carbon Accounting® standard, nor current regulations. These results are intended to assist you in understanding climate issues and identifying your action priorities. Therefore carrying an essentially educational value, the calculation of your establishment's carbon footprint via our tool constitutes a first step in your adaptation to the consequences of climate change.

sites.title: Which establishments should the footprint cover?
sites.etp: Number of staff (teachers and non-teaching staff)

login.explanation: Let's measure your establishment's greenhouse gas emissions!

signup.description: Create a Clickson account with your email and a school postal code or name
signup.schoolPostalCodeOrNamePlaceholder: The postal code or name of the school establishment
signup.schoolSearchGlossary: Find your school establishment by entering its postal code or name, then selecting it from the dropdown list.
signup.schoolPostalCodeOrNameRequired: Please enter the school postal code or name
signup.Not authorized: This email is already used for Clickson or there's an issue with the account creation. Please see <link>the FAQ</link> or <support>contact support</support> if you think this is an error.
signup.Not known school: Please find and select your establishment.

validation.schoolPostalCodeOrName: Please enter the school postal code or name
